title: Disable the Steel Watch
content:
tash's coronation, Wyrm's Rock Fortress will be a hostile area when you return. You will get a quest update that Ravengard is dead when entering Wyrms Rock Fortress.

All Quests in Baldur's Gate 3 Acquire the Gauntlets for Helsik ♦ Aid the Underduke ♦ Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help ♦ Avenge Glut's Circle ♦ Avenge the Drowned ♦ Avenge the Hag Survivors ♦ Avenge the Ironhands ♦ Blind the Absolute ♦ Break Yurgi's Contract ♦ Break Yurgir's Contract ♦ Call of the Blood ♦ Capture Isobel the Selunit
